description: This file defines a Tag class used for categorizing and filtering notes within the application.

classes.name: Tag
classes.description: A simple representation of a tag or category used for filtering and organizing notes.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality operator to compare Tag objects based on case-insensitive name.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code based on the lowercase name for use in collections.
